name: Hansen Aviation
about: Hansen Aviation, based at Hodges Airport in western Chatham County, Georgia, offers professional and quality flight training in a personalized and non-intimidating environment. With over 26 years of experience and over 15,000 hours in the air, our instructor has flown a variety of aircraft, from gliders to jets. We provide more than the minimum government requirements to become a pilot; we share our passion and experience to make you a skilled aviator. Our training setting, away from the hustle of larger airports, ensures no delays and easy access to airports with control towers for advanced training. Start your aviation journey with a $120 discovery flight, which includes 30 minutes of hands-on flying, a pilot logbook, and answers to all your questions. Here, aviation is learned in a relaxed and ideal environment, making it the perfect place to begin your flying career or hobby.
